name: NanoCor Therapeutics
overview:

The gene will be delivered with AskBioâ€™s proprietary Biological NanoParticle (BNPâ„¢) and the Self-Complementary Vector technologies, which are derived from human adeno-associated virus vectors (rAAV).

funding_rounds.source_description: Medtronic Makes Equity Investment in NanoCor Therapeutics, Inc
